channel.title: Simple image verification
channel.description: Hey all, I'm making an autoscript for a (dutch) text-based game, and sometimes, the game shows an verification image, so i want scar to solve it. Fortunatly, the image verification is only numbers, and random bold or non bold and 2 font sizes, so it must be not that hard. here's the random image: http://www.drugsdealen.nl/codeopvragen.php?&email=hannesvermeire@gmail.com (try to press refresh, so you can see what is possible...) Can anyone help me, so scar reads the image and saves it in an int/string Thanks very much Drunkenoldma

item.title: Simple image verification
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You could try and get an image dump and compare bitmaps.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple image verification
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Fine out what fonts they are, then you can use the 'Textinareaex, ect.

Something like:

var fonts: array[1..2] of string;
var i, e: integer;
begin 
  fonts[1]:= 'someting';
  fonts[2]:= 'tingsome';
  for i:= 1 to 4 do
  begin
    if (i <= 2) then e:= 1 else e:= 2;
    Iforgetthenameofthefunction(fonts[e], (thesize)i... ect);
  end;
end.

Sorry it wasn’t to helpful, i havn’t coded in Scar in a very long time. It’s just what i’d do.
Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple image verification
item.dc:creator: @dark_sniper dark_sniper
item.description:
@dark_sniper wrote:

its like the uptext in runescape…

just make the right bitmaps of each number 1-9 with both fonts and bold and not bold…

if you need help with it just ask i might have enough time.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple image verification
item.dc:creator: @Drunkenoldma Drunkenoldma
item.description:
@Drunkenoldma wrote:

Hey all,
I’m making an autoscript for a (dutch) text-based game, and sometimes, the game shows an verification image, so i want scar to solve it.
Fortunatly, the image verification is only numbers, and random bold or non bold and 2 font sizes, so it must be not that hard.
here’s the random image:
http://www.drugsdealen.nl/codeopvragen.php?&email=hannesvermeire@gmail.com
(try to press refresh, so you can see what is possible…)
Can anyone help me, so scar reads the image and saves it in an int/string
Thanks very much
Drunkenoldma
